DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , double-blind , parallel-group study evaluate efficacy safety RoActemra/Actemra ( tocilizumab ) combination methotrexate versus RoActemra/Actemra monotherapy patient rheumatoid arthritis inadequate response methotrexate . All patient receive RoActemra/Actemra 8 mg/kg intravenously ( iv ) every 4 week plus oral methotrexate 16 week . Patients achieve low disease activity Week 16 randomize receive 12 week RoActemra/Actemra treatment plus either methotrexate placebo . Anticipated time study treatment 28 week .
DOC.brief_title: A Study RoActemra/Actemra ( Tocilizumab ) Combination With Methotrexate Versus RoActemra/Actemra Monotherapy Patients With Rheumatoid Arthritis Inadequate Response Methotrexate
